AT.name: GALAXY BLASTER
AT.description: Bei GALAXY BLASTER musst Du Dein Schiff gegen angreifende Alien-Schiffe verteidigen. Beweg Dein Paddle nach rechts oder links und berühre dann den Bildschirm, um den Blaster abzufeuern. Sei vorsichtig, wenn der Gegner in Deine Basis eindringt, oder Du das Ziel zu oft verfehlst, ist das Spiel vorbei!

AU.name: GALAXY BLASTER
AU.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

BG.name: GALAXY BLASTER
BG.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

BE.name: GALAXY BLASTER
BE.description: Dans GALAXY BLASTER, vous devez défendre votre vaisseau des navires étrangers venant en sens inverse. Déplacez votre pagaie à gauche ou à droite, puis touchez l'écran pour tirer au canon. Attention, si la cible entre dans votre base, ou que vous manquez les cibles trop de fois, le jeu est terminé !

CH.name: GALAXY BLASTER

EE.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

ES.name: GALAXY BLASTER
ES.description: En GALAXY BLASTER, debes defender tu aeronave de las de los alienígenas que se aproximan. Muévete hacia la izquierda o derecha y luego pulsa la pantalla para disparar. Ten cuidado, si el objetivo entra en tu base o fallas demasiados disparos... ¡El juego se acaba!

IT.name: GALAXY BLASTER
IT.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, devi difendere la tua nave dalle navi aliene che sopraggiungono. Muovi la paletta a sinistra o a destra e poi tocca lo schermo per far fuoco con il blaster. Fa attenzione, se il bersaglio entra nella tua base o se manchi i bersagli troppe volte, è game over!

LT.name: GALAXY BLASTER
LT.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

NO.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

NL.name: GALAXY BLASTER
NL.description: In GALAXY BLASTER moet je jouw schip verdedigen tegen de binnenkomende schepen van de buitenaardse wezens. Beweeg jouw peddel naar links of rechts en tik dan op het scherm om de blaster te vuren. Wees voorzichtig, als het doelwit jouw basis binnenkomt, of je mist de doelen teveel keer, dan is het spel gedaan!

NZ.name: GALAXY BLASTER
NZ.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

PL.name: GALAXY BLASTER
PL.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

PT.name: GALAXY BLASTER
PT.description: No GALAXY BLASTER, terá de defender a sua nave de naves alienígenas que o estão a atacar. Mova o paddle para esquerda ou para a direita e toque no ecrã para disparar as armas. Tenha cuidado, se os alvos entrarem na sua base, ou se falhar os alvos demasiadas vezes, perde o jogo!

RU.name: GALAXY BLASTER
RU.description: В GALAXY BLASTER нужно защищать свой корабль от кораблей пришельцев. Крутите колесо влево или вправо, а затем нажмите на экран, чтобы открыть огонь из бластера. Осторожно - если враг залетит к вам на базу, или если вы будете слишком часто промахиваться, то вы проиграете!

SE.name: GALAXY BLASTER
SE.description: In GALAXY BLASTER, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!
